question: which journal did Donald E Knuth publish his last paper ?
query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.journalid, t3.year FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid = t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid = t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname = 'Donald E Knuth' GROUP BY t3.journalid, t3.year ORDER BY t3.year DESC NULLS LAST
